Magus Physics Display
- Main code setting the float values, with additions by Achilles
[Magus, Achilles]
Revision ---- DOL Offset ---- Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code -

1.02 ----- 0x80165334 --- 4803F885 -> Branch
